title: PER
description: The name of a person or group performing this work in public.

name.description: Last name of a person or full name of a group that has performed the work in public. Note that if the performer is known by a single name, it should be entered in this field.

first_name.description: First name associated with the performing artist identified in the previous field.

ipi_name_number.description: The IPI Name Number corresponding to this performing artist. Values reside in the IPI database.

isni.description: The ISNI assigned to the performing artist. Values reside in the INSI-IA Database

language.description: The language used in the performance. Values and reference for this field reside in the Language Code Table.

dialect.description: The dialect used in the performance â€“ must be a valid code from ISO 639-2(T). These values and reference reside in the Dialect Code Table e.g. if the performance is in Mandarin, YUE Cantonese, MIN NAN or HAKKA, then use: CHN, YUH, CFR or HAK
